body: Hi Theodore, Once you have BSDF then you can apply it to a single surface but in case you want to make sure that the thickness will be modeled correctly then you may use two surfaces. Check slides 43 and 44 from this presentation by Andy: [http://www.radiance-online.org/community/workshops/2014-london/pres...](http://www.radiance-online.org/community/workshops/2014-london/presentations/day1/McNeil_BSDFsandPhases.pdf)
